About Dan Kelley

Dan is a Professor of Oceanography at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada. Some information about him and his work can be found at the following links.

  1. ResearchGate website, which provides free PDFs of publications, along with inaccurate citation counts
  2. Dalhousie University website, which provides contact information and (by university mandate) mentions just five publications
  3. Google-scholar website, which provides publisher links to some publications (which will require login), along with citation counts that seem to be somewhat more accurate than those on ResearchGate.

Dan is the author of the Oce package for oceanographic analysis in R, and readers can follow its development, along with other things he makes public, by viewing his Github repositories.

In late 2013, Dan started experimenting with blogging, creating a WordPress blog. Finding the WordPress data entry scheme being somewhat arduous, and disliking the lock-in to a commercial site, he started experimenting with github blogging in early 2014, yielding the entries provided below. (The source for the blog, and also for the present page, is provided at github.)
